articles.title: 4 European countries agree to buy a combined $1 billion in U.S. weapons for Ukraine - NPR
articles.description: The weapons include U.S. missiles for Patriot air defense systems already in Ukraine. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy also said he had a "productive" call with President Trump.
articles.content:
KYIV, Ukraine Four European countries have agreed to buy $1 billion worth of U.S. weapons and send them to Ukraine under a new arrangement announced by President Trump last month.
